Travis Wernet

Website: thedreamingwell.com

Individual and Group Dream Work based on twenty years of study and offering groups and sessions privately and publically. Travis is also an ordained Universal Life Minister and is currently earning a BA in Psychology through Oregon State University. He is the author of The Dreaming Well: Paths Towards Wholeness Through Dreams, Story, Song and the Imagination.
